sections.heading: Effect of Repealing Local Act Governing City Public Library
sections.text:
If the local act governing a city public library is repealed, the governing body of the city shall succeed to all title and interest in the real and personal property of the library.

History:1973, Act 181, Imd. Eff. Dec. 28, 1973

sections.heading: Operation and Maintenance of Library by Governing Body of City.
sections.text:
The governing body of the city may continue to operate and maintain the library in accordance with appropriate statutes of this state or the charter of that governmental unit.

History:1973, Act 181, Imd. Eff. Dec. 28, 1973

sections.heading: Conveyance of Library Property to Other Governing Body.
sections.text:
The governing body of the city may convey the property of such library to the governing body of another governmental unit for use of the property for library purposes.

History:1973, Act 181, Imd. Eff. Dec. 28, 1973
